Running BlastP to get Lottio ortho for all roslin proteins



```{bash}
cd ../data
curl -O https://gannet.fish.washington.edu/seashell/snaps/GCF_000327385.1_Helro1_translated_cds.faa
```


```{bash}
/home/shared/ncbi-blast-2.11.0+/bin/makeblastdb \
-in ../data/GCF_000327385.1_Helro1_translated_cds.faa \
-dbtype prot \
-out ../blastdb/Lottia-tcds
```

```{bash}
pwd

```


```{bash}
/home/shared/ncbi-blast-2.11.0+/bin/blastp \
-query /home/shared/8TB_HDD_01/sr320/github/nb-2022/C_gigas/data/GCF_902806645.1_cgigas_uk_roslin_v1_translated_cds.faa \
-db ../blastdb/Lottia-tcds \
-out ../output/CgR-blastp-Lot.tab \
-num_threads 20 \
-max_target_seqs 1 \
-max_hsps 1 \
-outfmt "6 qaccver saccver evalue"
```
